knownIssues.title: Limited File Format Support
knownIssues.description: Currently only supports JSONC/JSON formats. Excel and CSV support needed for broader adoption.
knownIssues.workaround: Users must convert Excel/CSV files to JSON format manually

knownIssues.title: Test Execution Limited to Matrix View
knownIssues.description: Test cases can only be executed through the traceability matrix, limiting workflow flexibility.
knownIssues.workaround: Navigate to traceability matrix to execute tests

knownIssues.title: No GitHub Integration
knownIssues.description: Cannot directly sync with automation repositories, requiring manual test case maintenance.
knownIssues.workaround: Manual export/import of test automation data

knownIssues.title: Complex Initial Setup
knownIssues.description: New users face learning curve without guided onboarding process.

knownIssues.title: Health Score Calculation Edge Cases
knownIssues.description: Health scores may show unexpected values when no test cases are mapped to requirements.
knownIssues.workaround: Ensure all requirements have mapped test cases

knownIssues.title: Batch Operations Missing
knownIssues.description: No support for bulk test execution or batch status updates.
